document_data.name: Porpoise
document_data.mainbody: '''Porpoises''' were a species of aquatic mammal.
document_data.Description: The length of a porpoise ranged from {{SIrange|4|6|ft|long=yes}} and they usually weighed between {{SIrange|110|160|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Behavior: Porpoises were known for being friendly and playful. They were also helpful.
document_data.Abilities: Porpoises were capable of holding their breath for a significant amount of time. Porpoises used sonar to see, using high-pitched sound waves that many creatures could not detect to see objects and other creatures to a distance of {{SI|120|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Habitat: Porpoises were found in temperate climates and warm oceans.
document_data.Uses: Porpoises were a common companion animal to [[druid]]s and [[ranger]]s who lived in aquatic environments.
